full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: E6MON-23PQFL - RMSO Fresh Fruits and Vegetables

## Important Details

*   [Solicitation Number](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tenders/open-tenders) : WS3971410438
*   [Publication Date](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tenders/open-tenders) : September 8, 2023
*   [Tender Closing Date and Time](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tenders/open-tenders) : October 5, 2023, 2:00 PM (EDT)
*   [Contracting Entity](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tenders/open-tenders) : Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   [Trade Agreements](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tenders/open-tenders) : Various

## Tender Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of Fisheries and Oceans Canada, Correctional Service of Canada, and Department of National Defense is issuing a request for a Standing Offer for the acquisition of fresh fruits and vegetables located in Quebec.

## Tender Documents

All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by the closing date and time. Bids submitted after the closing time will be declared non-responsive.

## Contact Information

You may contact Julien, Lisa-Marie (SPAC/PSPC) at [lisa-marie.julien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:lisa-marie.julien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) for any questions.

## Tender Status

The tender announcement has expired, and the tender is now closed. This announcement is for information purposes only. 

### Regions of Delivery

The tender is open for delivery in the following regions:

*   Quebec (except National Capital Region)

### Regions of Opportunity

No regions of opportunity have been specified in this announcement.

### Procurement Method

The tender is conducted on a competitive, open-tender, selection-criteria basis.

### Trade Agreements

This tender is covered by the following trade agreements:

*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Korea Free
